name: Metropolis
description:
Metropolis was founded in 1996, by Brent Myrold, Kevin Boynton and Kevin Kent - advertising colleagues with big dreams and lofty goals. Our ideas and plans were grand, if not our accommodations. Nestled in a carriage house of an old mansion in the shadow of downtown, we were ready to take on the advertising world. Thus, the name Metropolis – the underdog, creating good in the big city.
As our business grew, so did our family. Each of these unique personalities defines the collective ‘is’ in Metropolis.
